title: Ben and Jerry's debut beer-flavored ice cream
text:
Ben and Jerry’s has a new beer-flavored ice cream.
The ice cream makers partnered with Colorado-based New Belgium Brewing to make a Salted Caramel Brown-ie Ale ice cream.
>> Read more trending stories
The brewery makes a brown ale that’s added to the ice cream along with salted caramel and brownie bites.
While there's no alcohol in the dessert, you will need to be 21 or over to purchase the new flavor, according to the Ben and Jerry's website.
For more, visit MyFoxBoston.com .
